name: SOCIETY FOR ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS, RESEARCH, TRAINING AND HEALTH
briefDescription: SEARTH vision is to create an equal and sustainable society by empowering the underprivileged where poverty has been overcome and people live in dignity and security. SEARTH is committed in addressing development and policy issues by working in partnership with people to build sustainable, healthy & productive communities. We empower through professionals to develop knowledge and skills successfully and promote the economic independence of disadvantaged women by providing professional attire, a network of support and the career development tools to help women thrive in work and in life. As an organization we try to prevent & alleviate human suffering in the face of emergencies by mobilizing the power of volunteers & the generosity of donor.
